content:
Compute the sum of two matrices.
Matrix A =  [[1,2], 
              [3,4]] 
Matrix B =  [[5,6],
              [7,8]]

To compute the sum of two matrices, we add the corresponding elements from each matrix. Given:

Matrix A:
\[
\begin{bmatrix}
1 & 2 \\
3 & 4
\end{bmatrix}
\]

Matrix B:
\[
\begin{bmatrix}
5 & 6 \\
7 & 8
\end{bmatrix}
\]

The sum of matrices A and B, denoted as Matrix C, is calculated as follows:

\[
\begin{bmatrix}
1+5 & 2+6 \\
3+7 & 4+8
\end{bmatrix}
=
\begin{bmatrix}
6 & 8 \\
10 & 12
\end{bmatrix}
\]

So, the sum of Matrix A and Matrix B is:
\[
\begin{bmatrix}
6 & 8 \\
10 & 12
\end{bmatrix}
\]
